leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 地球科学-遥感与地理空间生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→检测/分割→变化检测→评测
leaf_cluster.tool_form: GIS工具 + CV框架 + 数据集

unit.unit_name: 遥感预处理（校正/拼接/云检测）

queries: [WEB] satellite image atmospheric correction tools github
[WEB] remote sensing cloud masking algorithms github

tools.name: getSpatialData
tools.one_line_profile: R package for querying, previewing, downloading, and preprocessing spatial data
tools.detailed_description: An R package that facilitates the acquisition and preprocessing of spatial data from various sources, streamlining the workflow for remote sensing analysis.

tools.name: POS2IDON
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for ocean feature detection with Sentinel-2 imagery
tools.detailed_description: A processing pipeline developed by AIR Centre for detecting ocean features using Sentinel-2 satellite data, supporting marine monitoring tasks.

tools.name: MAJA
tools.one_line_profile: Level-2A processor for atmospheric correction and cloud detection
tools.detailed_description: A software developed by CNES for processing satellite images (Sentinel-2, Venus, Landsat) to Level-2A, performing atmospheric correction and cloud detection.

tools.name: WASP
tools.one_line_profile: Weighted Average Synthesis Processor for cloud-free image synthesis
tools.detailed_description: A tool by CNES to produce monthly cloud-free synthesis images from Sentinel-2 Level 2A data, minimizing artifacts in composites.

tools.name: HIFtool
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for HSI-MSI fusion and pan-sharpening
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolbox implementing various algorithms for Hyperspectral and Multispectral image fusion and pan-sharpening.

tools.name: atmcorr
tools.one_line_profile: Atmospheric correction tool using Py6S for MODIS data
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool from DHI-GRAS for performing atmospheric correction on satellite imagery using the 6S radiative transfer model.

tools.name: terracotta
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight XYZ tile server for geospatial data visualization
tools.detailed_description: A versatile tile server built with Flask and Rasterio that serves geospatial raster data as XYZ tiles for visualization in web maps.

tools.name: Multi-Scale-and-Depth-CNN-for-Pan-sharpening
tools.one_line_profile: CNN-based implementation for remote sensing image pan-sharpening
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Multi-Scale and Multi-Depth Convolutional Neural Network for pan-sharpening remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: PyRawS
tools.one_line_profile: Python utilities for processing Sentinel-2 RAW data
tools.detailed_description: A software toolkit by ESA-PhiLab for opening and processing Sentinel-2 RAW data (decompressed Level-0), enabling low-level data manipulation.

tools.name: hypro
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for calibration of airborne imaging spectroscopy data
tools.detailed_description: A processing workflow designed for the geometric and radiometric calibration of airborne hyperspectral data, specifically for HySpex sensors.

tools.name: Fmask (Python)
tools.one_line_profile: Cloud and cloud shadow detection algorithm for Landsat and Sentinel-2
tools.detailed_description: Python implementation of the Fmask (Function of mask) algorithm for automated detection of clouds and cloud shadows in satellite imagery.

tools.name: Fmask4
tools.one_line_profile: Automated cloud, shadow, and snow masking tool
tools.detailed_description: The official MATLAB implementation of Fmask 4.0, providing advanced cloud, cloud shadow, and snow detection for Landsat and Sentinel-2 data.

tools.name: geoutils
tools.one_line_profile: Library for analysis of georeferenced rasters and vectors
tools.detailed_description: A Python library built on top of Rasterio and Geopandas to simplify the handling and analysis of georeferenced rasters, vectors, and point clouds.

tools.name: digital-elevation-model
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for transforming and visualizing Digital Elevation Models
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolset for reading, transforming, projecting, and visualizing Digital Elevation Models (DEMs) such as ASTER GDEM and EU-DEM.

tools.name: odeon
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for remote sensing
tools.detailed_description: A task-agnostic deep learning framework developed by IGN specifically for remote sensing applications, facilitating model training and inference.

tools.name: RS-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Cloud detection algorithm for satellite imagery
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning based algorithm (U-Net architecture) for detecting clouds in satellite imagery, provided as a reusable implementation.

tools.name: GDAL.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia wrapper for the Geospatial Data Abstraction Library (GDAL)
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing bindings to GDAL, enabling geospatial data reading, writing, and processing within the Julia programming environment.

tools.name: iCGIS
tools.one_line_profile: Simple GIS software based on Qt and GDAL
tools.detailed_description: A desktop GIS application developed with C++, Qt, and GDAL, providing basic geospatial data visualization and processing capabilities.

tools.name: MapServer
tools.one_line_profile: Open source platform for publishing spatial data and interactive mapping applications
tools.detailed_description: A long-standing open-source development environment for building spatially-enabled internet applications, enabling the serving of geospatial data.

tools.name: SIAC
tools.one_line_profile: Sensor Invariant Atmospheric Correction
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Sensor Invariant Atmospheric Correction (SIAC) algorithm to produce surface reflectance from satellite imagery.

tools.name: gdal.netcore
tools.one_line_profile: GDAL bindings for .NET applications
tools.detailed_description: A library providing C#/F# bindings for GDAL 3.x, enabling .NET developers to integrate geospatial data processing capabilities into their applications.

tools.name: pyMeteo
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for meteorological data processing
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for handling and processing meteorological data, providing utilities for common tasks in atmospheric science.

tools.name: GDAL
tools.one_line_profile: Translator library for raster and vector geospatial data formats
tools.detailed_description: GDAL is a translator library for raster and vector geospatial data formats that presents a single raster abstract data model and single vector abstract data model to the calling application for all supported formats.

tools.name: CloudODM
tools.one_line_profile: Command line tool to process aerial imagery in the cloud using OpenDroneMap
tools.detailed_description: CloudODM is a command line tool to process aerial imagery in the cloud, acting as a client for OpenDroneMap nodes to facilitate photogrammetry workflows.

tools.name: PDAL
tools.one_line_profile: Point Data Abstraction Library for point cloud data processing
tools.detailed_description: PDAL is a C++ library for translating and manipulating point cloud data, functioning similarly to GDAL but for point cloud data.

tools.name: UAVProduct
tools.one_line_profile: UAV image processing tool for geometric correction and stitching
tools.detailed_description: A tool for processing UAV imagery, utilizing OpenMVG, OpenMVS, and GDAL to implement geometric correction, image stitching, and point cloud generation.

tools.name: CloudMasking
tools.one_line_profile: QGIS plugin for cloud masking of Landsat products
tools.detailed_description: CloudMasking is a QGIS plugin designed to mask clouds, cloud shadows, cirrus, aerosols, ice/snow, and water for Landsat products using various algorithms like Fmask.

tools.name: Geospatial-COSICorr3D
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for satellite image processing and 3D surface displacement extraction
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools and libraries for processing satellite images, including sensor model refinement, orthorectification, sub-pixel image correlation, and 3D surface displacement extraction.

tools.name: Sen2Agri-System
tools.one_line_profile: Software system processing Sentinel-2 images for agriculture
tools.detailed_description: Sentinel-2 for Agriculture (Sen2Agri) is a software system funded by ESA for processing high-resolution satellite images for agricultural monitoring purposes.

tools.name: UAVSAR-Radiometric-Calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Radiometric calibration tool for airborne radar
tools.detailed_description: A tool to perform radiometric calibration of airborne radar data, developed by researchers at NASA JPL.

tools.name: OpenAthena-Legacy-Python
tools.one_line_profile: Geodetic location spotting tool for drones
tools.detailed_description: OpenAthena allows common drones to spot precise geodetic locations from aerial imagery.

tools.name: Shadow-Detection-Algorithm
tools.one_line_profile: Shadow detection and correction algorithm for aerial/satellite images
tools.detailed_description: Python implementation of a shadow detection and correction algorithm for aerial and satellite imagery.

tools.name: Fiona
tools.one_line_profile: Library for reading and writing geographic data files
tools.detailed_description: Fiona is a Python library that reads and writes geographic data files, providing a clean and simple API for OGR.

tools.name: grs
tools.one_line_profile: Atmospheric correction processor for high resolution satellite images
tools.detailed_description: GRS is an atmospheric correction processor designed for high spatial resolution multispectral satellite images.

tools.name: cog_worker
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable analysis tool for Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs (COGs)
tools.detailed_description: cog_worker enables scalable arbitrary analysis on Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs (COGs), facilitating distributed processing of geospatial data.

tools.name: AtmosphericCorrection
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of 6S model for atmospheric correction
tools.detailed_description: A Python version of the 6S model for atmospheric correction, supporting GF1, GF2, Landsat-8, and Sentinel-2 imagery.

tools.name: geeSharp
tools.one_line_profile: Pan-sharpening tool for Google Earth Engine
tools.detailed_description: geeSharp implements pan-sharpening algorithms within the Google Earth Engine code editor environment.

tools.name: ACOLITE
tools.one_line_profile: Generic atmospheric correction module for aquatic applications
tools.detailed_description: ACOLITE is a generic atmospheric correction module developed for processing satellite imagery, particularly for aquatic applications.

tools.name: ACOLITE_LS2
tools.one_line_profile: Atmospheric correction for Landsat and Sentinel-2 (Legacy)
tools.detailed_description: A legacy version of ACOLITE specifically for atmospheric correction of Landsat and Sentinel-2 data for aquatic applications.

tools.name: ACOLITE_MR
tools.one_line_profile: Atmospheric correction for metre-scale satellites (Legacy)
tools.detailed_description: A legacy module of ACOLITE for atmospheric correction of metre-scale satellite imagery for aquatic applications.

tools.name: TACT
tools.one_line_profile: Thermal Atmospheric Correction Tool
tools.detailed_description: TACT is a tool for thermal atmospheric correction, part of the ACOLITE ecosystem.

tools.name: godal
tools.one_line_profile: Golang wrapper for GDAL
tools.detailed_description: Godal is a Go library that provides idiomatic Go bindings for the GDAL geospatial library.

tools.name: FAME-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Frequency-Adaptive Pan-Sharpening with Mixture of Experts
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the FAME-Net model for pan-sharpening, utilizing a frequency-adaptive mixture of experts approach.

tools.name: Pan-Mamba
tools.one_line_profile: Effective Pan-Sharpening with State Space Model
tools.detailed_description: Pan-Mamba is a deep learning model for pan-sharpening satellite imagery based on State Space Models (Mamba architecture).

tools.name: gdalcubes
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for creating and analyzing Earth observation data cubes
tools.detailed_description: gdalcubes is a library and tool for creating and processing Earth observation data cubes from satellite imagery collections.

tools.name: loam
tools.one_line_profile: Javascript wrapper for GDAL in the browser
tools.detailed_description: Loam is a JavaScript wrapper for GDAL that allows running geospatial data processing tasks directly in the browser using WebAssembly.

tools.name: AROP
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Registration and Orthorectification Package for remote sensing imagery
tools.detailed_description: A C-based package designed for the automated registration and orthorectification of remote sensing images, facilitating geometric correction workflows.

tools.name: gdal (Rust)
tools.one_line_profile: Rust bindings for the Geospatial Data Abstraction Library (GDAL)
tools.detailed_description: Provides Rust idiomatic bindings to GDAL, enabling high-performance geospatial data manipulation, conversion, and processing within the Rust ecosystem.

tools.name: LabCD
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation tool for remote sensing change detection datasets
tools.detailed_description: A specialized annotation tool designed for creating ground truth data for remote sensing change detection tasks, supporting efficient labeling of bi-temporal images.

tools.name: pansharpen_python
tools.one_line_profile: Command-line tool for multispectral image pan-sharpening
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based command-line utility implementing various pan-sharpening algorithms (Brovey, FIHS, Wavelet, PCA) to fuse high-resolution panchromatic and lower-resolution multispectral images.

tools.name: dans-gdal-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of advanced GDAL-based utilities for raster processing
tools.detailed_description: A suite of command-line utilities extending GDAL's capabilities, including tools for mosaicking, tile merging, and other specialized raster operations.

tools.name: gdal2cesium
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for Cesium-compatible 3D terrain tiles from GDAL rasters
tools.detailed_description: A tool to convert digital elevation models (DEMs) readable by GDAL into the heightmap format used by the Cesium virtual globe for 3D visualization.

tools.name: stackstac
tools.one_line_profile: Convert STAC catalogs into Dask-based xarray DataArrays
tools.detailed_description: A library that facilitates cloud-native remote sensing analysis by turning SpatioTemporal Asset Catalog (STAC) metadata into lazy-loading xarray objects backed by Dask.

tools.name: Google Earth Enterprise
tools.one_line_profile: Open source platform for building and hosting geospatial applications
tools.detailed_description: The open-source version of Google Earth Enterprise, allowing organizations to build and host their own private versions of Google Earth and Google Maps using their own geospatial data.

tools.name: polymer
tools.one_line_profile: Atmospheric correction algorithm for ocean color data
tools.detailed_description: A specialized Python package for atmospheric correction of satellite ocean color data, particularly effective in the presence of sun glint and thin clouds.

tools.name: ceramic
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for loading web map tiles as raster objects
tools.detailed_description: An R package that simplifies downloading and loading map tiles from various web servers directly into GDAL-compatible raster objects for analysis.

tools.name: GeoWombat
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for large-scale geospatial data processing
tools.detailed_description: A Python library built on top of Rasterio and Dask designed to simplify and scale remote sensing image processing tasks such as mosaicking, radiometric correction, and classification.

tools.name: interpies
tools.one_line_profile: Geophysical data analysis and transformation toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A collection of functions for reading, displaying, transforming, and analyzing geophysical data, particularly potential field data (magnetic and gravity).

tools.name: pyroSAR
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for large-scale SAR satellite data processing
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for large-scale processing of Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) data, providing wrappers for ESA SNAP and GAMMA software to facilitate automated workflows.

tools.name: naip-cogeo-mosaic
tools.one_line_profile: Serverless mosaic creation for NAIP imagery
tools.detailed_description: A toolset for creating and serving serverless high-resolution aerial imagery map tiles from Cloud-Optimized GeoTIFFs (COG), specifically focused on the NAIP dataset.

tools.name: usgs-topo-tiler
tools.one_line_profile: Reader for USGS Historical Topographic Map tiles
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to read and serve Web Mercator map tiles directly from USGS Historical Topographic Maps, facilitating access to historical geospatial data.

tools.name: Insta360-2-ODM
tools.one_line_profile: Convert Insta360 video to GPS-tagged images for photogrammetry
tools.detailed_description: A utility script that extracts frames from GPS-tracked Insta360 videos and tags them with geolocation data, preparing them for processing in OpenDroneMap (ODM).

tools.name: homonim
tools.one_line_profile: Surface reflectance correction for drone and aerial imagery
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for correcting drone, aerial, and satellite imagery to surface reflectance, handling radiometric calibration and atmospheric effects.

tools.name: orthority
tools.one_line_profile: Orthorectification tool for aerial and satellite imagery
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to orthorectify drone, aerial, and satellite imagery, correcting for terrain displacement and camera geometry.

tools.name: LandsatTS
tools.one_line_profile: R package for Landsat time-series retrieval and analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to facilitate the retrieval, cleaning, cross-calibration, and phenological modeling of Landsat time-series data for ecological analysis.

tools.name: gdal (Go)
tools.one_line_profile: Go (Golang) wrapper for GDAL
tools.detailed_description: A Go programming language wrapper for the GDAL library, enabling geospatial data processing and format conversion within Go applications.

tools.name: rio-cloudmask
tools.one_line_profile: Rasterio plugin for cloud masking in satellite imagery
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the Rasterio CLI that provides functionality to identify and mask clouds in multi-spectral satellite imagery, facilitating cleaner analysis.

tools.name: rio-color
tools.one_line_profile: Color correction and adjustment plugin for Rasterio
tools.detailed_description: A Rasterio plugin that provides color correction operations for raster data, including gamma adjustment, saturation, and contrast manipulation, useful for preparing satellite imagery for visualization.

tools.name: rio-glui
tools.one_line_profile: Browser-based visualization tool for Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs
tools.detailed_description: A tool to explore and visualize Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs (COGs) directly in the browser using Mapbox GL JS, facilitating quick inspection of raster data.

tools.name: rio-hist
tools.one_line_profile: Histogram matching plugin for Rasterio
tools.detailed_description: A Rasterio plugin for performing histogram matching between raster datasets, allowing for color balancing and normalization of satellite imagery scenes.

tools.name: rio-l8qa
tools.one_line_profile: Landsat 8 Quality Assessment (QA) band processing tool
tools.detailed_description: A CLI tool and Python library for parsing and processing Landsat 8 Quality Assessment (QA) bands to generate cloud masks and other quality indicators.

tools.name: rio-mbtiles
tools.one_line_profile: Rasterio plugin to export rasters to MBTiles format
tools.detailed_description: A command-line plugin for Rasterio that exports raster datasets into MBTiles 1.1 SQLite files, facilitating the creation of tile-based map datasets.

tools.name: rio-mucho
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel processing wrapper for Rasterio
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper for Rasterio that facilitates parallel processing of raster data, enabling faster execution of windowed read/write operations on large datasets.

tools.name: rio-pansharpen
tools.one_line_profile: Pansharpening tool for Landsat scenes
tools.detailed_description: A Rasterio plugin and CLI for performing pansharpening on Landsat satellite imagery, fusing lower-resolution multispectral bands with the higher-resolution panchromatic band.

tools.name: rio-rgbify
tools.one_line_profile: Encoder for arbitrary bit depth rasters into pseudo base-256 RGB
tools.detailed_description: A tool to encode arbitrary bit-depth raster data (such as DEMs) into RGB tiles, commonly used for terrain visualization in web mapping clients like Mapbox GL.

tools.name: rio-toa
tools.one_line_profile: Top Of Atmosphere (TOA) reflectance calculator for Landsat 8
tools.detailed_description: A Rasterio plugin to calculate Top Of Atmosphere (TOA) reflectance and brightness temperature from Landsat 8 DN values using metadata coefficients.

tools.name: mapchete
tools.one_line_profile: Tile-based geodata processing framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework for processing raster and vector geodata in tiles (pyramid structure), handling reprojection, mosaicing, and analysis using Rasterio and Fiona.

tools.name: SPECTACLE
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral and radiometric calibration for consumer cameras
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for the spectral and radiometric calibration of consumer cameras, developed as part of the MONOCLE H2020 project for water quality monitoring.

tools.name: MULTIPLY Atmospheric Correction
tools.one_line_profile: Atmospheric correction for Sentinel-2 and Landsat-8
tools.detailed_description: An atmospheric correction tool for Sentinel-2 and Landsat-8 optical data, developed within the MULTIPLY H2020 project, utilizing 6S radiative transfer models.

tools.name: SMAC-Python
tools.one_line_profile: Simplified Method for Atmospheric Correction (SMAC) implementation
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Simplified Method for Atmospheric Correction (SMAC) algorithm, used for correcting satellite imagery for atmospheric effects.

tools.name: Start_maja
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow manager for MAJA atmospheric correction processor
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools to prepare and launch the MAJA (MACCS-ATCOR Joint Algorithm) processor for cloud detection and atmospheric correction on Sentinel-2 time series.

tools.name: Open Data Cube Core
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for managing and analyzing continental-scale Earth Observation data
tools.detailed_description: The core library of the Open Data Cube (ODC) initiative, providing a Python framework for indexing, accessing, and analyzing large collections of Earth Observation data.

tools.name: Orfeo ToolBox (OTB)
tools.one_line_profile: Open source library for remote sensing image processing
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive C++ library for remote sensing image processing, offering a wide range of algorithms for preprocessing, segmentation, classification, and analysis of high-resolution images.

tools.name: PanNet-Landsat
tools.one_line_profile: Deep network architecture for pansharpening
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of PanNet, a deep learning model designed for pansharpening satellite imagery, specifically demonstrated on Landsat data.

tools.name: pyimpute
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial classification and regression using Scikit-learn and Rasterio
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that integrates Scikit-learn with Rasterio to perform spatial classification and regression (imputation) on geospatial raster data.

tools.name: plcompositor
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for creating seamless and cloudless image mosaics
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool developed by Planet Labs for generating seamless, cloud-free image mosaics from deep stacks of satellite imagery using best-pixel selection techniques.

tools.name: rio-stac-io
tools.one_line_profile: Rasterio extension for STAC access
tools.detailed_description: A Rasterio extension that enables direct reading of SpatioTemporal Asset Catalog (STAC) Items and ItemCollections using native GDAL drivers.

tools.name: simple-tiles
tools.one_line_profile: Simple tile generation library
tools.detailed_description: A C library for generating map tiles from shapefiles and other data sources, useful for creating custom basemaps or data visualizations.

tools.name: Fmask
tools.one_line_profile: Function of Mask (Fmask) algorithm for cloud detection
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Fmask algorithm (Function of Mask) for automated cloud, cloud shadow, and snow masking in Landsat and Sentinel-2 imagery.

tools.name: pygac
tools.one_line_profile: Reader and calibrator for NOAA/Metop AVHRR GAC/LAC data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for reading, navigating, and calibrating NOAA and Metop AVHRR Global Area Coverage (GAC) and Local Area Coverage (LAC) data.

tools.name: sf
tools.one_line_profile: Simple Features for R
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R package for handling geospatial vector data using Simple Features, providing interfaces to GDAL, GEOS, and PROJ for data manipulation and analysis.

tools.name: Rasters.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Raster manipulation library for the Julia language
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for manipulating raster data, providing a unified interface for various raster formats and operations, designed for high-performance geospatial data processing.

tools.name: rasterio
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for reading and writing geospatial raster datasets
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a Pythonic interface to GDAL's raster I/O capabilities, widely used for reading, writing, and manipulating geospatial raster data in scientific workflows.

tools.name: otbtf
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning interface for Orfeo ToolBox (OTB) using TensorFlow
tools.detailed_description: A remote sensing application that enables the use of TensorFlow deep learning models within the Orfeo ToolBox (OTB) pipeline, facilitating scalable inference on satellite imagery.

tools.name: ARCSI
tools.one_line_profile: Automated production of Analysis Ready Data (ARD) for optical satellites
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for the automatic generation of Analysis Ready Data (ARD) from Landsat, Sentinel-2, and other optical satellite sensors, handling atmospheric correction, cloud masking, and topographic correction.

tools.name: Py6S
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface to the 6S Radiative Transfer Model
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper for the 6S (Second Simulation of a Satellite Signal in the Solar Spectrum) Radiative Transfer Model, used for atmospheric correction and simulation of satellite observations.

tools.name: MODIStsp
tools.one_line_profile: R package for automatic preprocessing of MODIS time series
tools.detailed_description: An R package that automates the download, mosaicking, reprojection, and quality assessment of MODIS Land Products time series data.

tools.name: 6S_emulator
tools.one_line_profile: Atmospheric correction using a 6S emulator
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing atmospheric correction on satellite imagery using an emulator of the 6S radiative transfer model, enabling faster processing.

tools.name: gee-atmcorr-S2
tools.one_line_profile: Atmospheric correction of Sentinel-2 images on Google Earth Engine
tools.detailed_description: A workflow/script for performing atmospheric correction of Sentinel-2 imagery directly within the Google Earth Engine platform.

tools.name: EOReader
tools.one_line_profile: Sensor-agnostic Python library for reading and stacking remote sensing data
tools.detailed_description: A remote sensing library that simplifies reading optical and SAR sensor data, handling band stacking, cloud masking, and spectral indices in a sensor-agnostic manner.

tools.name: georeader
tools.one_line_profile: Python utility for processing raster data
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Python library for reading and processing geospatial raster data, designed to simplify common remote sensing tasks.

tools.name: radical
tools.one_line_profile: Radiometric calibration tools for consumer RGB(D) cameras
tools.detailed_description: A C++ toolkit for performing radiometric calibration on consumer-grade RGB and RGB-D cameras, useful for close-range remote sensing and photogrammetry.

tools.name: AGStoShapefile
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to convert ArcGIS Server Map Services to GeoJSON and Shapefile
tools.detailed_description: A command-line utility that scrapes data from ArcGIS Server Dynamic Map Services and converts it into standard geospatial formats like GeoJSON and Shapefile, facilitating data access for research.

tools.name: gdal2tiles
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for generating map tiles based on GDAL
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementation of the gdal2tiles utility, allowing for the generation of raster map tiles for web mapping and analysis from within Python scripts.

tools.name: GCPEditorPro
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for managing Ground Control Points (GCPs)
tools.detailed_description: A web-based interface for creating, editing, and managing Ground Control Points (GCPs) to support geometric correction and photogrammetry workflows.

tools.name: python-fmask
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of the Fmask cloud detection algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A Python package and command-line utility implementing the Fmask (Function of Mask) algorithm for cloud and cloud shadow detection in Landsat and Sentinel-2 imagery.

tools.name: GeoProj
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning tool for blind geometric distortion correction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool for correcting geometric distortions in images without requiring ground control points, useful for rectifying satellite or aerial imagery.

tools.name: Deep-Learning-PanSharpening
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning based pan-sharpening code package
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB package implementing multiple deep learning architectures (PNN, MSDCNN, PanNet, etc.) for pan-sharpening of satellite imagery.

tools.name: Landsat-LAI
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating Leaf Area Index (LAI) maps from Landsat images
tools.detailed_description: A data-driven tool for estimating and generating Leaf Area Index (LAI) maps using Landsat satellite imagery, supporting ecological and agricultural monitoring.

tools.name: pylandsat
tools.one_line_profile: CLI and Python library for searching, downloading, and preprocessing Landsat imagery
tools.detailed_description: pylandsat provides a command-line interface and a Python API to search, download, and preprocess Landsat satellite imagery. It simplifies the workflow of acquiring Landsat data and preparing it for analysis.

tools.name: ArchGDAL.jl
tools.one_line_profile: High-level Julia interface for the GDAL geospatial data abstraction library
tools.detailed_description: ArchGDAL.jl is a Julia package that provides a high-level, idiomatic API for GDAL (Geospatial Data Abstraction Library), enabling efficient reading, writing, and manipulation of raster and vector geospatial data.

tools.name: OvertureMapsDownloader
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to download and process geospatial data from Overture Maps
tools.detailed_description: OvertureMapsDownloader simplifies the manipulation of geospatial data from Overture Maps by integrating DuckDB, Dask DataFrames, and GDAL/OGR tools to facilitate downloading and processing large-scale map data.

tools.name: ICAMS
tools.one_line_profile: InSAR troposphere correction toolbox using global atmospheric models
tools.detailed_description: ICAMS is a Python-based toolbox for InSAR troposphere correction. It utilizes global atmospheric models and considers the spatial stochastic properties of the troposphere to improve Interferometric Synthetic Aperture Radar data quality.
